input.sentences: this is a very unique place that not many people know about . researchers come here to learn about wildlife .
the seals are comfortable enough to sit on the beach and sun bathe and play .
there are other creatures that come onto the island and make it their home .
the rocks surrounding the island are huge but a beautiful site .
the wildlife are extreme here . there are even kangaroos .
output.sentences: The researchers went to get ready for their study.
They observed seals sitting in the sunlight.
They found the seals on the island.
Surrounding the seal area was many rocks for protection.
The wildlife there was very extreme.
